abstract: During an often contentious panel discussion in Davos, Switzerland, Jamie Dimon of JPMorgan Chase defended the banking industry’s changes since the financial crisis as Axel Weber, the chairman of UBS, criticized central bankers.
snippet: During an often contentious panel discussion in Davos, Switzerland, Jamie Dimon of JPMorgan Chase defended the banking industry’s changes since the financial crisis as Axel Weber, the chairman of UBS, criticized central bankers.
lead_paragraph: DAVOS, Switzerland — Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, apologized again for the bank’s recent $6 billion trading loss, this time in front of an audience that included the elite of the financial world. But in keeping with his confident demeanor, it was a diet portion of humble pie.

headline.main: At Davos, Financial Leaders Debate Reform and Monetary Policy

abstract: The overall mood at Davos was more sober than in years past, but there was plenty of room for pointed remarks from luminaries and dignitaries in attendance.
snippet: The overall mood at Davos was more sober than in years past, but there was plenty of room for pointed remarks from luminaries and dignitaries in attendance.
lead_paragraph: It’s only the first full day of the World Economic Forum festivities in Davos, Switzerland, and already the gloves are coming off.

headline.main: At Davos: Dimon’s Cuff Links, Schwarzman’s Tone and Swag
